title: [Korean artist] (TEFC)
brief_description: Begins with a resume of ancient Korean art. Then introduces the work of Lee Hyung Pyo, a contemporary Korean painter. Lee’s continuing artistic problem is to find a way of bridging the distance between the traditional culture into which he was born and the inescapable influences of the present.
